pkgmetadata.longdescription: Amos Tanay's Group High Performance Statistical Utilities // A collection of high performance utilities to compute distance, correlation, auto correlation, clustering and other tasks. Contains graph clustering algorithm described in "MetaCell: analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data using K-nn graph partitions" (Yael Baran, Akhiad Bercovich, Arnau Sebe-Pedros, Yaniv Lubling, Amir Giladi, Elad Chomsky, Zohar Meir, Michael Hoichman, Aviezer Lifshitz Amos Tanay, 2019 doi:10.1186/s13059-019-1812-2).
